values: Only One Life: Christ’s Invincible Gospel and Global MissionOnly One Life: Christ’s Invincible Gospel and Global Mission

God is sovereign, and he has purposed his gospel to spread to the ends of the earth. Those who give themselves to that purpose are invincible, even through suffering.God is sovereign, and he has purposed his gospel to spread to the ends of the earth. Those who give themselves to that purpose are invincible, even through suffering.
